column2: If you’re looking for good espresso, this is not your place. They use an automatic espresso machine that spits out mediocre drinks with the press of a button.  That being said, this is one of the few cafes you can actually sit inside of right now, and the pasties are pretty good.
Good coffee and bright, spacious setup with lots of seating.
$16 for an espresso and muffin. No itemized receipt or prices listed on the food menu at the counter. The food was just okay, wouldn’t have paid more than $7 unless coerced.
Good Equator Coffee and a lot of room to sit around and work.
Coffee isn't good, and definitely not worth the money
This is just a coffee bar inside the lobby of the Clancy. Nothing special.
Good coffee. A lot of room to sit.
I should have looked @ the reviews. Overpriced bad.
6am to 11am. What an insanely useless business hours
Great customer service and I enjoyed the Mocha I ordered
